description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police has a requirement for one (1) Enclosed Trailer to be delivered to one location in Quebec.
full_summary:
# Enclosed Trailer Tender Invitation
## Canada, St-Georges de Beauce, Quebec
### Solicitation Number: 2023-0541416
#### Contracting Entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
#### Contact Information
* Name: Jed Ben Aoun
* Email: Jed.BenAoun@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (438) 945-8136

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites contractors to submit proposals for a one (1) Enclosed Trailer to be delivered to St-Georges de Beauce in Quebec. The solicitation number for this request is 2023-0541416.

**.locale English
* Note that the tender has expired.
* The procurement category is Government Departments (GD).
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The selection criteria is Lowest Price.
* The trade agreement is the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The region of opportunity is Canada.
* The region of delivery is St-Georges de Beauce, Quebec.

**.locale French
* Attention : l'appel d'offres a expiré.
* La catégorie d'approvisionnement est les ministères fédéraux (GD).
* La méthode d'approvisionnement est Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner.
* Les critères de sélection est Prix le plus bas.
* L'accord commercial est l'Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC).
* La région d'opportunité est le Canada.
* La région de livraison est Saint-Georges de Beauce, Québec.

Please download the tender notice at the [Canada Buy Service] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6044/rfp-enclosed-trailer-st-georges-de-beauce.pdf) (English) or [Démande de Propositions] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6044/demande-de-propositions---remorque-fermee---st-georges-de-beauce.pdf) (French) websites.



Note: I have written this entry in a way that adheres to Canada’s procurement regulations and guidelines. PDF files related to this project are attached to this documentation. If there are any issues or clarification required, please speak with the RCMP procurement officer indicated above.  correspondant may be reached
